name: Avoidsbot
description: A Telegram bot designed to help users report scams efficiently.

API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID. Obtain this from https://my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API Hash. Obtain this from https://my.telegram.org

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Telegram Bot Token. Get this from @BotFather on Telegram

MONGO_DB_URI.description: MongoDB Connection URI. Obtain this from MongoDB Atlas or your MongoDB instance

IMAGE_URL.description: URL of the image used in reports. Upload to an image hosting service and use the URL

AWAIT_ROOM_ID.description: ID of the channel for report approval/rejection

CHANNEL_ID.description: ID of the public channel for publishing reports
